name: pltraining-dirtree
author: Alex Cline <alex.cline@gmail.com>, Puppetlabs Education Team <eduteam@puppetlabs.com>
summary: This includes a dirtree function to builds an array of directories from a full directory path or an array of full directory paths to be used as a file resource title. It also includes a dirtree resource type which can ensure the existance only of a full directory path.
